newsitem.title: POLAND: RTL eyes opening Polish radio station - paper.
newsitem.headline: RTL eyes opening Polish radio station - paper.

text.p: Luxembourg's radio and television network RTL is considering opening a radio station in Poland, the Gazeta Wyborcza daily said on Tuesday.
The paper, which quoted no sources, said the idea was discussed at a meeting of a Luxembourg business delegation with Polish entrepreneurs on Monday, but gave no further details.
Marek Ostrowski, deputy head of the licence department at the Radio and Television council told Reuters RTL had so far not submited any application for a broadcasting licence.
A broadcasting licence can be granted only to a company in which foreign firms do not hold more than 33 percent.
